snippet: WILLEY--John F.,Died April 24, 2016 in New York City. Born August 13, 1930 in Haverhill, MA. A project manager at the engineering firms of VHB and Stone & Webster, his team consulted for the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority during construction of the Big Dig in Boston. Cherished husband of Barbara R. Greenberg. Loving father of Patti, Barbie, Laura, Linda, Cheryl, Sharon, Rick, Debi, and Johnny (deceased), and brother of Norma. Grandfather of ten and great-grandfather of two. Dear friend of many. Donations to Stepping Stones Foundation www.steppingstones.org or charity of one's choice. 1/3

Grandfather of ten and great-grandfather of two. Dear friend of many. Donations to Stepping Stones Foundation www.steppingstones.org or charity of one's choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WILLEY, JOHN F.
